from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        N = len(points)
        points.sort()
        
        X = [0] * N
        Y = [0] * N
        
        for i in range(N):
            X[i] = points[i][0] + points[i][1]
            Y[i] = points[i][0] - points[i][1]
        
        X.sort()
        Y.sort()
        remove = 0
        
        
        
        X = SortedList(X)
        Y = SortedList(Y)
        
        best = inf
        for x,y in points:
            X.remove(x+y)
            Y.remove(x-y)
            best = min(best, max(X[-1]-X[0],Y[-1]-Y[0]))
            X.add(x+y)
            Y.add(x-y)
        return best
